p.k: Drama Chile (2014). Hrají: Maria Olga Matte, Shenda Roman, Patricia Velasco. Režie: Rosario Espinosa, Enrique Farias.
p.d: Cristina (49) has spent her life taking care of her mother Carmen. Single and without a trade or friends, she grows older, year after year in her hometown. A few days from her birth- day, Cristina reconnects with Sandra, a former schoolmate who will show her other ways to live, freely and without prejudice.
